response.original_title: Clonar a un hombre: los cuidados
response.overview: How do men care for others today, why do they do it less than women, and do they do anything to better participate in caregiving more frequently and more efficiently?  “Cloning a man: caregiving” aims to fuel the conversation about masculinities in order to increase men's co-responsibility in caregiving.
response.title: Clonar a un hombre: los cuidados
